title: Chapter X - DIVISION OF WATER RESOURCES
content:
Chapter X - DIVISION OF WATER RESOURCES
State Regulations

Subchapter A - GENERAL (Article 1 to 3)

Subchapter B - CLASSES AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE AND TIDAL SALT WATERS (Article 1 to 19)

Appendices (Appendix 2 to 56)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subchapter A - GENERAL (Article 1 to 3)

Subchapter B - CLASSES AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE AND TIDAL SALT WATERS (Article 1 to 19)
